effects.description: Gatot activates a Shield of Resolve as the heir of kings, providing a shield equal to Attack ×220%-380% that will be deducted first. Lasts for 5 seconds. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

Gatot’s inherent regal aura intimidates all enemy heroes, reducing their Attack by 1%-5% and increasing his Attack by that same percentage multiplicatively by number of intimidated heroes, for 3 seconds. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}
Gatot’s exceptional combat skills resemble a powerful war dance, granting him a 3%-15% chance of dodging enemy Normal Attacks and 4%-20% Crit Rate. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}
Gatot commands his troops with imperial-guard tactics, increasing his Infantry’s Defense by 6%-30%. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}
The great king blesses his Infantry, granting them a Shield equal to Attack ×6%-30% each time they attack, lasting 1 turn. :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}
Gatot’s formidable legion instills fear in enemies, reducing their Attack by 5%-25%. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}
